thread.title: Maxis adding the iPhone 7 Red Edition to its lineup
thread.title_full: Maxis adding the iPhone 7 Red Edition to its lineup

author: Erna Mahyuni
title: Maxis adding the iPhone 7 Red Edition to its lineup
text:
Maxis adding the iPhone 7 Red Edition to its lineup If you think red is cooler than black, this is the iPhone for you 24 March 2017 / 13:08MYT 
Maxis put up a teaser on its website, saying that the iPhone 7 Red edition will be coming soon to the telco. A hot shade with the same specs 
How much will it cost you? It's likely Maxis will include the phone with its usual Zerolution package, and in 128GB and 256GB storage versions. 
Pricing is the same as the usual iPhones, meaning RM3699/RM4199 for the iPhone 7 128GB and 256GB versions and RM4299/RM4799 for the iPhone 7 Plus versions. 
If you opt for the Maxis pacakge it's likely that it will follow the current iPhone 7 pricing models on Maxis: RM145 per month for the iPhone 7 and RM170 for the iPhone 7 Plus with the MaxisOne Plan 188. 
You could also just pay the device price outright, starting from RM2050 for the iPhone 7 128GB and the iPhone Plus at RM2550. If you're willing to pay that much, though, you might as well get the iPhone 7 models for RM500 at official Apple distributors such as Machines or SenHeng. But they wouldn't be red now, would they? 
Check out what we think of Apple's latest and greatest here .
